text: niyamakarayen pirisudu kara nathi duwili bandunu widuli panka, wayu samikarana yanthra wagema duwili bandunu janel dora thira nisi lesa pawithra nokala kotta metta ura, porawana redi, parisaraye duwilla, dara lip duma saha wahana duma, asbastas kendithi bandu kruthrima wayu dushaka, nagarabadawa jiwathwima, rakiyawe swabhawaya hethukota ema sthanayedi athiwana dushitha wayuwata godura wima, gal anguru pulun aashritha karmantha, redipili karmantha, krushikarmika katayuthuwaladi aaghranaya wena kadmiyam pramukha krushi rasayana, weldin wadawaladi nagena duma me sandaha mulikawa balapana karunuya.

deshasima haraha layisthugatha kirim , niyamana anukulathwaya thaththwayan magin wasi ath karaganima ha aarthikaya wardhanaya katayuthu sandaha mulya pahasukam sapayime kotas huwamaru bhumikawa pilibanda sakachcha kirimata aayojana pragdhana welendapola aayathana, aayojana wisheshagnyayan saha niyamana ha welendapola pradhanin sandaha wishesha awasthawak lesa dakunu aasiyanu welendapola thula aayojanaya prawardhanaya kirima aramunu karagath, loka banku daththawalata anuwa 2000 ha 2012 athara 6.7% k samanya wardhanayak wartha wu kalapaye pawathwana dakunu aasiyanu aayojana samuluwa hadinwiya haka.

samanyayen aya - waya lekhanayak karanne mudal warshaya aarambha kirimata perathuwaya.warthamana shri lankawe rajya mulya katayuthu sandaha mudal warshaya lesa salakenne janawari palamu wanida sita desambar 31 dakwa wu kala parichchedayayi.ee nisa mudal warshaya aarambha kirimata prathama nowambar masaye di wisarjana panath ketumpatha parlimenthuwata idiripath kota palamuwani, dewani, thewani kiyawa mudal warshaya aarambha kirimata prathama aya - waya lekhanaya sammatha kara gath wita eya rate likhitha nithiyak bawata path we.ikuth sathiye janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen ambailipitiye di raswu kabinat mandalaya 2010 ya mudal warshaya sandaha aya waya lekhanayak idiripath karana thek rajaye eekabaddha aramudalin mudal - waya kirimata parlimenthuwe anumathiya laba ganima sandaha athuru sammatha ginumak sammatha kara ganimata thiranaya karanu labiya.
